page.title: 08SCHOOLS
page.content: In 1977 Primary and Secondary Schools were re_organised into a three tier system. Three Middle Schools for 9 to 13 yr. old children were built. The children at this school transfer at 9 years old to the Allhallows Middle School.This reduced considerably the numbers in the primary schools and we became a First School with 5 to 9 yr olds. The Hundred of Hoo Comprehensive School caters for 13 to 18 yr old children The system has not been adopted as yet in any other part of the Medway Education Division. The original intention was to abolish tests at 11 yrs which channelled children into grammar or seconary modern schools and provide equal education opportunity for all in a comprehensive school.
